sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>Restraining bolts serve the same function on droids as restraints do on other sentients. Once affixed to a droid, the bolts can override their programming. The simplest setting shuts the droid down, but restraining bolts can also force droids to perform any actions they are commanded to do by the person holding the restraining bolt controller. Standard restraining bolts are produced by the billions by companies like Industrial Automation.  Most droids cannot resist restraining bolts when one is attached to them (a process that requires a few seconds and a spot-welder). However, any Player Character who happens to be a droid is obviously made of sterner stuff than NPC droids. Player Character droids may make a Daunting (4 difficulty dice) Discipline check to overcome the effects of a restraining bolt and act normally when the bolt is applied. They may retry the test at the CM's discretion.  Models Include: Numerous Variants.</description> <encumbrance>0</encumbrance> <hard_points/> <hp_required/> <name>Restraining Bolt</name> <number>GEAR0001081</number> <price>35</price> <range/> <rarity>0</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 21:32:02</sys_created_on> <sys_id>9abfb7a42f94a450e0f497eef699b654</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 21:32:02</sys_updated_on> <type>gear</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
